ext_sysparallel.h

00002 #define __SYSPARALLEL_H__

00004 #if C74_PRAGMA_STRUCT_PACKPUSH

00007     #pragma pack(2)
00008 #endif
00009

00012 #endif // __cplusplus
00013 
00014 
00015 #define SYSPARALLEL_PRIORITY_DEFAULT    0x00
00016 #define SYSPARALLEL_PRIORITY_LOW        0x00
00017 #define SYSPARALLEL_PRIORITY_MEDIUM     0x04
00018 #define SYSPARALLEL_PRIORITY_HIGH       0x08
00019 
00020 #define SYSPARALLEL_MAX_WORKERS         64
00021 
00022 #define SYSPARALLEL_STATE_IDLE          0
00023 #define SYSPARALLEL_STATE_RUN           1
00024 #define SYSPARALLEL_STATE_DONE          2
00025 
00026 typedef struct _sysparallel_task
00027 {
00028     t_object    ob;
00029     void        *obex;
00030     void        *data;          // global task data
00031     method      workerproc;     // worker callback function 
00032     long        workercount;    // number of workers to use
00033     struct _sysparallel_worker  **workers;  // worker array     
00034     char        priority;       // thread priority 
00035     char        benchmark;      // benchmark
00036     long        iteration;      // for benchmarking 
00037     double      begintime;      // for benchmarking
00038     double      endtime;        // for benchmarking
00039     long        cancel;         // for cancel request
00040 
00041 } t_sysparallel_task;
00042 
00043 
00044 typedef struct _sysparallel_worker
00045 {
00046     t_object        ob;
00047     void            *obex;
00048     void            *data;          // worker specific data
00049     method          workerproc;     // worker callback function, worker object passed in
00050     t_sysparallel_task *task;       // pointer to task parent (can be used to access global task data)
00051     long            id;             // worker id
00052     double          begintime;      // for benchmarking (uses task info)
00053     double          endtime;        // for benchmarking (uses task info)
00054     
00055 } t_sysparallel_worker;
00056 
00057 
00058 void sysparallel_init(void);
00059 long sysparallel_processorcount(void);
00060 t_sysparallel_task *sysparallel_task_new(void *data, method workerproc, long workercount);
00061 t_max_err sysparallel_task_execute(t_sysparallel_task *x);
00062 t_max_err sysparallel_task_cancel(t_sysparallel_task *x);
00063 void sysparallel_task_free(t_sysparallel_task *x);
00064 void sysparallel_task_benchprint(t_sysparallel_task *x);
00065 void sysparallel_task_data(t_sysparallel_task *x, void * data);
00066 void sysparallel_task_workerproc(t_sysparallel_task *x, method workerproc);
00067 
00068 t_sysparallel_worker *sysparallel_worker_new(void *data, method workerproc, t_sysparallel_task *task);
00069 t_max_err sysparallel_worker_execute(t_sysparallel_worker *x);
00070 void sysparallel_worker_free(t_sysparallel_worker *x);
00071 
00072 #ifdef __cplusplus
00073 }
00074 #endif // __cplusplus
